title: MPH: Can Red Bull do a 'McLaren' and turn F1 on its head again?
summary: One year ago McLaren scored a shock Miami win, but it proved a changing of the F1 guard â€“ can Red Bull do the same to fight back in Florida this weekend, asksMark Hughes

qa_pairs.question: Which team shocked the F1 world with a win at the Miami Grand Prix a year ago?
What is the significance of McLaren's win at the Miami Grand Prix in the context of Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It marked a changing of the F1 guard.
wrong_options: It was their first race of the season.

qa_pairs.question: What is Red Bull Racing aiming to achieve in the upcoming Miami Grand Prix?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A comeback to fight back in Florida.
wrong_options: To maintain their current championship lead
